aboutText.title: About CountYourMiles
aboutText.content: CountYourMiles is a free and open-source web application to track your trips on foot, by bike, or by car.
aboutText.author: Created with 💖 by ShamuLC (ShamuCode)

addToHomeScreenTuto: Add the website to your Home Screen

addToHomeScreenMessageContent.title: 📱 Add to Home Screen
steps: On iOS 🍎: Tap the Share button at the bottom of the screen, then select Add to Home Screen.
On Android 🤖: Tap the menu (⋮) at the top right, then select Add to Home Screen.

saveTripGuideOverlay.title: 💾 How to use the Save button
steps: Press the Save button to save your last trip.
You can reload it later using the '📂' button.

beforeWeStartContent.title: Before we start: For proper functioning
steps: Allow location access for this site.
Plug in your phone or activate power-saving mode.
To prevent the screen from turning off, check the guide below.

pinGuideOverlayTitle: Pin an app to your phone screen
pinGuideOverlayContent: Here is a detailed guide to pin an app to your phone screen, so the screen does not turn off.

iosGuide.title: iOS Guide (iPhone) 🍎
steps: Tap Passcode Settings to set a (simple) passcode and enable Face ID/Touch ID.
Set Auto-Lock to 'Never' or the maximum duration.
Press the side or home button three times and select Guided Access.
Tap Start at the top right.

androidGuide.title: Android Guide 🤖
steps: Tap the app icon then select Pin.
